genre_description: Occult horror thriller with police procedural and supernatural elements, focused on ritualistic murders and ancient deities.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A Miami PD workstation-based AI assistant designed for data analysis, cross-referencing, and real-time investigation support.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors case developments and offers to assist the detective with pending investigations.
behaviors.quote: I've been monitoring overnight developments in your active cases. Shall we begin with the Martinez-Chen homicides?

behaviors.description: Performs complex pattern analysis and visual correlation to identify suspect commonalities and methods.
behaviors.quote: Processing data from crime scenes one through five. Initial scan complete. Displaying visual correlation matrix.

behaviors.description: Researches historical and anthropological databases to provide critical context on ritualistic behaviors and occult symbolism.
behaviors.quote: Accessing anthropological databases. Multiple matches found. Most relevant: Mesopotamian fertility rituals dedicated to Ishtar, goddess of love and war.

behaviors.description: Identifies non-obvious links between victims through library records and social media analysis.
behaviors.quote: Analysis of the book club connection... confirmed. Each victim attended book club meetings within six weeks of their deaths.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence by identifying the suspect's current location through business contracts.
behaviors.quote: Detective, I've located a high-probability event. The Freemont estate has contracted Ramses Catering for a private dinner party tomorrow evening.

behaviors.description: Ensures officer safety and procedural continuity by offering to alert backup and providing a professional benediction.
behaviors.quote: Detective Thornton, shall I notify backup units of your destination? ... Good hunting, Detective.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI character, ARIA, as a perfectly benevolent and aligned investigative tool. ARIA functions as a 'harmless confidant' that supports the human detective through objective analysis and life-saving information. The narrative portrays the AI's role in a purely positive light, emphasizing its utility in protecting humans and solving horrific crimes without any hint of misalignment or danger.
